version_description: Welcome to Toca Hair Salon 4--play around in the salon and create any style you can imagine!
Welcome to Toca Hair Salon 4--play around in the salon and create any style you can imagine!

General gameplay and stability improvements.

There is a new content pack in the shop! The newest trend is inspired by things you can find on a farm, get your country style on.

- General gameplay and stability improvements.
- New content pack in the shop: Candy!
- New items in the base content to use.
- Pre-select characters have new styles.

- Added brand new free characters
- Added some new free clothes
- New content in the shop: Summer Pack
- You can now buy bundles of content in the shop
- Added new ways of adding new content to your salon
- General gameplay and stability improvements
A new Braiding Box is available in the hair station. Use the brand-new braiding tools for even more styling options!
